name: NSGlyphStorage
desc: A set of methods that a glyph storage object must implement to interact properly with NSGlyphGenerator.

items.name: func attributedString() -> NSAttributedString
items.desc: Returns the text storage object from which the NSGlyphGenerator object procures characters for glyph generation.

items.name: func insertGlyphs(UnsafePointer<NSGlyph>, length: Int, forStartingGlyphAt: Int, characterIndex: Int)
items.desc: Inserts the given glyphs into the glyph cache and maps them to the specified characters.

items.name: func setIntAttribute(Int, value: Int, forGlyphAt: Int)
items.desc: Sets a custom attribute value for a given glyph.
